text: Question 80 In a virtual memory system, size of the virtual address is 32-bit, size of the physical address is 30-bit, page size is 4 Kbyte and size of each page table entry is 32-bit. The main memory is byte addressable. Which one of the following is the maximum number of bits that can be used for storing protection and other information in each page table entry?
